title: FS Germany Schaefer SGC 40 EPDG Elite 11
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: FS Germany Schaefer SGC 40 EPDG Elite 11
posts.post_content:
Very nice looking T206 Germany Schaefer SGC 40 with El Principe de Gales back.  Tons of great info on the Elite 11s on this forum, and here's your chance to get one of them.  The chart is PSA pop report - clearly difficult cards to find.

Price: $200 net, free shipping.
